Crimes.Legal_Issue: Credibility findings, reasonableness of decision, procedural fairness
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Appeal from IAD decision on marriage sponsorship
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Negative – inconsistencies in testimony affected credibility
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage was genuine and not for immigration purposes
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: History of non-genuine marriages and inconsistent spousal testimony
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Administrative appeal followed by judicial review
Crimes.Application_Error: Alleged errors in credibility assessment and procedural fairness
Crimes.Application_Factor: Prior marital history and spousal consistency
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Marriage deemed not genuine; appeal rejected
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether IAD erred in credibility or procedural fairness
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPA - Sponsorship inadmissibility for non-genuine marriage
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Non-genuine marriage primarily for immigration status
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Significant – applicant and spouse provided inconsistent accounts
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to IAD's credibility findings and procedural fairness
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Allegation of procedural unfairness in IAD hearing

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Credibility findings, reasonableness of decision, procedural fairness
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Appeal from IAD decision on marriage sponsorship
Crimes.Legal_Provision: IRPA - Marriage must be genuine for sponsorship
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage was genuine and not entered for immigration benefits
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Discrepancies in wedding attendees, finances, and cohabitation
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Administrative appeal followed by judicial review
Crimes.Application_Error: Alleged unreasonable credibility assessment and procedural unfairness
Crimes.Application_Factor: Multiple prior marriages and sponsorship attempts
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Marriage deemed not genuine; appeal rejected
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether IAD erred in credibility or procedural fairness
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPA - Prohibition on marriage of convenience
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Marriage not genuine, entered primarily for immigration benefits
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Significant – contradictions in key factual accounts
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to IAD’s evaluation of evidence and fairness
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Allegation of procedural unfairness during IAD proceedings
